TEXT: Your #yPokemon will assist you in battle. You can command them to use specific moves by clicking the buttons above their intent. In multi-enemy encounters, you can direct them to use single-target moves against a specific enemy.
LABEL: Your Pokemon

TEXT: You can #ycatch #yPokemon that are low on HP by pressing the #yThrow #yPokeball button next to a wild #yPokemon's intent. Capture success rate increases as the #yPokemon's health is lowered.
#yPokemon battles can be quite dangerous. It's best to capture as many #yPokemon as you can and build up a versatile team!
LABEL: Catching Pokemon
